components.description: Two women holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship.
components.title: Two Women Holding Hands

description: Two women holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship.
title: Two Women Holding Hands

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: TwoÂ womenÂ holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship. Two Women Holding Hands was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and http://emojipedia.org/two-women-holding-hands/
emoji_net_data.name: two women holding hands

bn:00105885a: Of or relating to or characterized by homosexual relations between woman

bn:00102884a: Of, relating to, or denoting the sex which is generally characterized as the one associated with the larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces fertilizable gametes (ova) from which offspring develop
Belonging to the sex with larger, fertilizable gametes.

Belonging to the sex which typically produces eggs, which in humans and most other mammals is typically the one which has XX chromosomes; belonging to the sex which has larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).

bn:00103344a: Characteristic of or befitting a friend

bn:00106204a: Feeling or showing love and affection

bn:00083805v: Squeeze (someone) tightly in your arms, usually with fondness
To clasp in the arms with affection; to take in the arms; to hug.
To squeeze someone in one's arms.

bn:00052121n: Love is a variety of different feelings, states, and attitudes that ranges from interpersonal affection to pleasure.
An intense feeling of affection and care towards another person.
A strong positive emotion of regard and affection
In the Italian or Latin languages
The form of romantic affection that is considered pure and wholly positive, not just based on feelings of lust.

Love is a word which refers to a variety of different emotional states, feelings or attitudes which range from those of simple personal pleasures or desires to those characterizing interpersonal affection and many forms of profound kindness, compassion, and benevolent concern for the good of others.

bn:00042759n: That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).
The part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in a human, and the corresponding part in many other animals.
The zoological term for the distal portion of the forelimb of an animal (including the human hand)
The (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb
The manus is the zoological term for the distal portion of the fore limb of an animal.
A hand, as the part of the fore limb below the forearm in a man, or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.
A hand is a prehensile, multi-fingered extremity located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates such as humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.

bn:00036545n: A close friendship between people who are in a same group or team.
Friendship is a relationship of mutual affection between two or more people.
A relationship between two people who hold mutual affection for each other
Friendship is a term used to denote co-operative and supportive behavior between two or more people.
Relationship between people who have mutual affection for each other
The state of being friends (or friendly)

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00023268n: A pair who associate with one another
A pair or couple, especially one that is harmonious or elegant.

bn:00040437n: The act, right, or power of giving or bestowing.
The act of softening, breaking, or yielding.

bn:00034453n: A young female human; (in contrast to boy), a female child or young adult.
A title of respect for a young woman (usually unmarried) with or without a name used.
A young female person, usually a child or teenager.
A girl is any female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.
A girl is a female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.

bn:00061450n: (plural) any group of human beings (men or women or children) collectively
Plurality of persons considered as a whole
A group of persons forming or belonging to a particular nation, class, ethnic group, country, family, etc.
Persons who exist in no programmatic feature category, or more than one category.
(plural peoples)Â  Persons forming or belonging to a particular group, such as a nation, class, ethnic group, country, family, etc; folk; community.
A group of persons forming or belonging to a particular nation etc.
A people is a plurality of persons considered as a whole, as in an ethnic group or nation.

bn:00036538n: A person other than a family member, spouse or lover whose company one enjoys and towards whom one feels affection.
A person with whom a Windows Live user has established a mutual social connection.
A person you know well and regard with affection and trust

bn:00894289n: Holding hands is a form of physical intimacy involving two or more people.

bn:00037545n: A lesbian is a female homosexual; a female who experiences romantic love or sexual attraction to other females.
Term describing sexual attraction between females
Bisexual and Transgender-an umbrella term for women of non-heterosexual sexuality. See also: LGBT
A homosexual female, a woman who is sexually or romantically attracted to other women.

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of two women holding hands showcases a warm and inclusive representation of partnership and friendship.  On Apple devices, the hands are rendered with Appleâ€™s characteristic smooth, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading, suggesting a gentle, supportive grip. Realistic lighting casts soft highlights, emphasizing the connection and solidarity between the two individuals, conveying a message of unity, companionship, or shared experiences.
